nodes.text: R0-4L0, referred to simply as ROLO, was an R0 astromech droid that served in the Resistance thirty years after the Battle of Endor. It served as Jessika Pava's astromech aboard her T-70 X-wing starfighter during the assault on Starkiller Base.
R0-4L0 first appeared in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, a film released in North America on December 18, 2015.
Hasbro released a large figure of R0-4L0 in a Target gift set with BB-8 and C-3PO.
